oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Childhood portrait of James M. Buchanan
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Formal portrait photograph, black and white, of James McGill Buchanan, Jr., as a young boy approximately 3 years old. He is dressed in white and posed in a seated position.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Buchanan, James M.
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: May be freely reproduced. Please provide proper attribution of digital image;
